description:
Kazuma and Kawachi work together to make the ultimate croissant, Ja-pan #43. But can it stand up against the croissant made by the strongest of the rookies, Kai Suwabara?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Charred!! This Is the Ultimate Claus Swann!?
Kurokoge! Kore ga Kyuukyoku no Kurowa-san!?
ไหม้ๆดำๆ เนี่ยนะเหรอคุโรวะซังด่านสุดท้าย
黒コゲ!! これが究極の黒輪さん!?
